package.name: meshproc_csg
package.description: Performs Constructive Solid Geometry operations on meshes given by the user. Operations: Union, Intersection, Difference, Symmetric Difference. Input formats: - files (URLs given in service call messages): 3DS, OBJ, OFF, PLY, STL. - ROS messages: shape_msgs/Mesh Output formats: same as input. Uses CGAL for mesh operations. Includes a redistribution of libkdtree++ (just the hpp files!).
package.author: Mihai Pomarlan
